response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am offering it to you at a special price of $15,000, which I believe is a fair opportunity for both of us to benefit from this extraordinary product. Please let me know if you are interested in exploring this offer further.", "product_price": 15000}
